Posts.Content: I need the same thing (am also in my early fifties) and they are checking out a breast cyst (benign). Try not to worry. Let us know what happens tomorrow...I go for mine on Friday.
Posts.Title: Breast concerns(new to me)

Posts.Content: I get a mammogram every year and have had micro calcifications for at least a decade now. Each year they just compare films and I've never been advised to get a biopsy. I have had my films looked at by two separate imaging places (one stopped taking my particular insurance) so I feel assured that I don't need to do more.
Posts.Title: cluster of micro calcifications in breast

Posts.Content: I'm no doctor but here's what I think. I think it's a fibroadenoma. They are rounded, firm and smooth and I have heard of other young women having them. In fact, my 50 year old sister has had hers (bilateral) for decades now and doctor is not worried at all. I so understand your worry, Mama! We love our kids and this scares the heck out of us.
Posts.Title: 20 year old daughter with breast lump - changing shape?

Posts.Content: Honey, I hate to say it but my inclination would be to say yes. Please let me know the results of Thursday's testing, will you?
Posts.Title: Worried about mom
